articles.content: Shares of Tata Communications were trading 1.86% higher at Rs 1,920.30 apiece in comparison with a 0.54% advance in the benchmark NSE Nifty 50 as of 10:26 a.m. It rose as much as 2.69% to hit a recor… [+455 chars]

articles.author: https://www.cnbctv18.com
articles.title: SJVN shares have gained more than 100% this year; a first in its history as a public company - CNBCTV18
articles.description: This is the first instance that SJVN has gained more than 100 percent in a calendar year since it listed in 2011. The previous best year for SJVN was 2015, when the stock had gained 29 percent.

articles.title: Gold, silver price today, September 11, 2023: Precious metals record hike on MCX | Check latest rates - India Today
articles.description: Gold Price Today 11 September 2023: Both gold and silver are trading on the higher side of the Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX) on Monday. Check the latest city-wise prices here.
articles.content:
Both gold and silver prices have recorded a hike on the Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX) on Monday, September 11.
